LanguageData.OG_Mechanicus_Tech_Base_T1.label: Mechanicum Initiation
LanguageData.OG_Mechanicus_Tech_Base_T1.description: Allows access to basic Mechanicus technology\n\nRequires a member of the Mechanicum if HAR is loaded.
LanguageData.OG_Mechanicus_Tech_Base_T2.label: Tech Adepts of Mars
LanguageData.OG_Mechanicus_Tech_Base_T2.description: Allows access to improved Mechanicus technology
LanguageData.OG_Mechanicus_Tech_Base_T3.label: Scions of Mars
LanguageData.OG_Mechanicus_Tech_Base_T3.description: Allows access to advanced Mechanicus technology
LanguageData.OG_Mechanicus_Tech_Weapons_Radium.label: Radium Weapons
LanguageData.OG_Mechanicus_Tech_Weapons_Radium.descri: Teaches Imperial subjects how to create Radium weapons
LanguageData.OG_Mechanicus_Tech_Weapons_Phosphor.desc: Teaches Imperial subjects how to create Adeptus Mechanicus Plasma weaponry
LanguageData.OG_Mechanicus_Tech_Weapons_AdvancedBalli: Teaches Imperial subjects how to create a Stub Carbine
LanguageData.OG_Mechanicus_Tech_Weapons_Volkite.label: Volkite Tech
LanguageData.OG_Mechanicus_Tech_Weapons_Volkite.descr: Volkite Weapons are an arcane term used by the Adeptus Mechanicus to refer to a class of powerful thermal ray weapons whose technology is pre-Imperial in origin and dates back to the Dark Age of Technology or the Age of Strife. These weapons possessed considerable killing power, surpassing most other armaments of their size.\n\nRequires Royalty
